narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Lasante Health Center INC is a Clinic/Center, Community Health provider based in Brooklyn, NY. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $56.0M in Medicaid payments across 687K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $56.0M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
